Diamond::

She knew that what he said about the drain was most likely correct 
and not a bluff.  She knew she had to use her wits.  This bot seemed 
very intelegent and possably could make a strong ally.  He had said 
he was high up in the ranks. This opened a window of opertunity for 
her.  She transformed into bot mode and walked over to Devilduer.

"Very well, I shall accompany you to where ever you need me.  I am in 
need of a cr." she said, looking down at her burn marks and leaking 
gun shot holes. 
"I shall join you.  You said earlier that you were high up in the 
ranks? That you make you...what..second, third in command?"  She 
bowed and showed proper respect to a higher ranking officer. On 
Cybertron, he wuld have been bowing to her, but then again, she 
wasn't on Cybertron.  "I shall follow you commander."  she stood up 
and looked at him.  Taking a few steps closer to him, she said in a 
hushed voice, "And I meant what I said earlier, we would have made a 
good team back home." She smiled at him and then started to walked 
down the hallway. Then she turned and faced him, "Ah, which way to 
your CR room?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> Motioning Threadshot and Catgut to be quiet, DevilDuer steps around 
> the corner, looking at Diamond and seeing the drain. He was a bit 
> surprized, he had had no idea that there were any drains whatsoever 
> in the base that he had spent most of his life on earth in.
> 
> "Allright," he says, putting away his gun. He knew it would be 
> useless to try and hit something so small anyways, and there were 
> always autoguns and Threadshot and Catgut in case of trouble, "I 
> gotta admit that yer good, but I neve' said that I wanted ya dead."
> 
> He frowns at the drain, "And don't bother with that thing, a 
command 
> from me can lock it up."
> 
> In truth, he had no idea if the drain even had a locking system, he 
> had never seen it before.
> 
> "Anyways, you look like yer a bot who knows what she's doin'. I 
think 
> I said before that the Alliance is the superior faction on the 
> planet, I think you'd do well with us. Ya got my word that I ain't 
> gonna shot at ya no more if you come along peacefully. If ya give 
me 
> a fight, I'm gonna shut that drain, sick the autoguns on ya, and 
> we'll see where we get from there."
> 
>
